description: Scene Six brings RESURRECTION to a nut-busting conclusion with our all-American hero on the receiving end of a Bacci/Johnson train. Paul Johnson has something for everyone - face, chest, cock - and that ass! He fucks Atkins hard and pulls out so Nino Bacci can get some. The lust and passion reach a crescendo when Johnson and Bacci drench the satiated Atkins in a cum bath. As RESURRECTION ends, Atkins licks the cum off his fingers, stares at the camera, and leaves you with the feeling that this won't be his last trip to a sex club.
title: Resurrection, Scene #06
